posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tate Davis
I am looking for a low grade n172 of Art Whitney with the dog.  I have a dog that looks just like the dog in the picture, and thats probably why this is the only Old Judge card that i really care to own.  If you have this card in a low grade, and would be interested in parting with it for a reasonable price, please send me an email and a scan if you have one.  Thank you very much.

Tate
tate_davis@yahoo.com

Edited to add my email address

Posted By: J Levine
Yep, Still looking for a lower grade Whitney w/ dog. Thanks,

Joshua
